author: ivaynberg
msg: since john removed the check for empty strings from formcomponent.convert() this is broken. the check was removed to converters can decide how to convert an empty string to the object instead of formcomponent.convert() always returning null. but this pushed the check into converters which havent been updated. bad john! bad!
